TopicTitle: How do i deploy the 'Gigantor XL solar array'?

Articles.Content:
I used the Space Station Core from stock and put it in orbit around Kerbin. I have 2 Gigantor XL solar arrays on it, but can't figure out how to deploy them. Can anyone please help?

Edited January 14, 2015 by Two of Three

Welcome to the forums

There should be an option to deploy the panels if you right-click on them while they're in their folded state. If you know how to use Action Groups, you can also configure one of them in the VAB so that a single key press opens all of them at once.
If you right click on them to highlight them there should be a deploy panel button.

If you know how to use Action Groups, you can also configure one of them in the VAB so that a single key press opens all of them at once.

Just a note/reminder: action groups are now locked behind SPH/VAB upgrades.
Ah, that's true. Thanks for the reminder!
